NetworkReferencedObject.name: NetworkReferencedObject
NetworkReferencedObject.description: A junction object that associates the loyalty program with the Experience Cloud site.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identifier for the Network Referenced Object.

NetworkId.description: Required. The Id of the Experience Cloud site associated with the loyalty program.

ReferencedObjectId.description: The object associated with the Experience Cloud site.
